description.narrative: By the end 2014 timely and adapted communication and social mobilization strategy are implemented to contribute to polio eradication and routine immunization., which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Immunization. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2014, children, families and duty bearers have the necessary information to change behaviours and make decisions to improve equity and investment in Angola's most vulnerable children.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end 2014 timely and adapted communication and social mobilization strategy are implemented to contribute to polioeradication and routine immunization.
